TEXT.TITLE: USP REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST <USPTS.O> 3RD
TEXT.BODY: Shr eight cts vs 10 cts Qtly div 30 cts vs 30 cts prior Net 204,064 vs 245,931 Nine mths Shr 1.14 dlrs vs 52 cts Net 2,850,042 vs 1,291,047 NOTE: 1987 and 1986 nine mths includes a net gain on sale of assets of 2,258,206 dlrs or 90 cts a share and 459,503 dlrs, respectively. Dividend payable November 13 to shareholders or record October 30. Reuter
